marks: Signature and Date LR in red: [Ensor 1883]; in black: [Ensor]
medium: Oil on canvas, mounted on panel
provenance:
(Boldini sale, Galerie Charpentier, Paris, France, 16 June 1955, lot 149). [1] Franz Charlet, Paris, France and Brussels, Belgium; [2] (Marlborough Fine Arts, Ltd., London, England); purchased by MIA in 1956.

[1] Galerie Charpentier sale entitled "Atelier Boldini et à divers amateurs." The painting was lot 149, which was in the subsection "2 - à divers amateurs."

[2] According to Xavier Tricot's catalogue raisonné.
title: Meadow Flowers
